htmlPopupType.title: popup type
htmlPopupType.description: type of the popup; well-known values are: ServerHTMLPopupTypeNone (no popup), ServerHTMLPopupTypeAsURL (content contains a URL) and ServerHTMLPopupTypeAsHTMLText (content contains the HTML text)

content.title: content
content.description: HTML content of the popup, may be HTML text or a URL depending on the htmlPopupType
